text:
Hi all.

I am updating our development timelines and just want to ask what people are seeing as a result of the updated way of developing themes.
Would I be right in saying there is about 10 hours in developing a navigation and a footer in the new theme CMS?

This is given to me by a developer and I’m trying to clarify if that is right. It seems too long.
Any help appreciated.
It’s hard to say, so many variables here. Instincts tell me that’s more than reasonable.
navigations tend to include a lot of back and forth with clients / colleagues, more than other content sections in my opinion.
so i think the developer kept that in mind while calculating the ammount of hours.
I agree. Add a bit of buffer in too - especially if it’s a responsive nav :slightly_smiling_face:
and if there is animation required

I'm building a client a new site based off the cms boilerplate theme. The client was already using HubSpot for blog listing and post pages from a different theme. So, I'm needing the existing blog pages to mirror the header & footer of the new site. The old theme is all drag and drop, for the new site i've build modules for everything i need. Should I be trying to import the blog stuff into the new theme, exporting header/footer sections to the old theme, or just trying to replicate the new header/footer in the old theme ?

Navigation is always one of the most time consuming things in my experience, because you need to style the dropdowns, the mobile navigation... etc. A really simple header might only take 2-3 hours, but many take 6-8 hours. A standard enough footer might be 2-3 hours.

I think 10 hours is a pretty reasonable estimate for a header/footer.

Thank you all for your feedback.
We provide the developers a design prior to development, so the time I am speaking of is purely development time.

Basing this off a standard nav, logo, menu, cta.
I know in the old way, it was a lot faster, but do understand the theme presents more variables and time.

Thank you all :pray:
Hi, please let me know what is the solution on this error, Thanks much
